summary: After hours of browsing the internet for Sansa costumes, I’ve determined that if I want to pay my bills and have a good...
body:
After hours of browsing the internet for Sansa costumes, I’ve determined that if I want to pay my bills and have a good costume…I’m gonna have to learn to sew.

HALP.

blog.description: Jenny. This blog consists mainly of Game of Thrones/A Song of Ice and Fire, with particular focus on Tyrion, but also among my favorites are Sansa, Cersei, Arya, and Brienne. I also occasionally post about video games or books or whatever else I find interesting.

summary: Once more, though. Tyrion saying no to marrying Lollys is not a yes to marrying Sansa, especially since he has already told...
body:
Once more, though.

Tyrion saying no to marrying Lollys is not a yes to marrying Sansa, especially since he has already told Tywin that he does not want to marry Sansa and continues to say no and never says yes.

And if you think that, you’re just as bad as anyone who says that Sansa agreed to marry Tyrion because she didn’t run away kicking and screaming.

An abusive choice is not consent. In any situation.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: ao3feed-sansan
blog.title: Sansan Feed
blog.description: Sansor/Sansa AO3 feed. Askbox on just in case. Happy shipping!

title: A Change in Plans
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PPHidv

by JRA3933

Sansa was tired. Tired of the events and pictures. Tired of the fake smiles. Tired of Joffrey. She knew there were many out there who would gladly trade places with her, would want the glamorous dresses and, would want to be Joffrey Lannister’s fiance. But they didn’t know him as she did. Sansa knew at least, that there was one person in King’s Landing she could trust.

Words: 5150, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Sansa Stark, Sandor Clegane, Joffrey Baratheon, Margaery Tyrell, Elinor Tyrell, Cersei Lannister, Ros (Game of Thrones)

  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern Setting

summary: A lot of people have claimed that Sansa would make a terrible ruler because, unlike many other characters, she’s never actually...
caption:
A lot of people have claimed that Sansa would make a terrible ruler because, unlike many other characters, she’s never actually been a ruler of anything. 


Yet this is an example of why she would be an excellent ruler! She has had first-hand experience of how a kingdom reacts to a bad ruler. She learned what should be done by witnessing exactly what should not be done. She learned the importance of keeping the people fed in S2 and that’s why in S7 that was arguably her biggest priority. 


Throughout her time in Kings Landing Sansa Stark not only learned how survive your enemies, she learned how to be a good ruler.

summary: I know that's theorized Sansa's going to expose Littlefinger of his frauds because of 'I dreamt that maid again, slaying a...
question: I know that's theorized Sansa's going to expose Littlefinger of his frauds because of 'I dreamt that maid again, slaying a savage giant in a castle built of snow' line but what if the dream was to foreshadow something else ?
answer:
Then I guess it foreshadows something else?

“I dreamt such a clangor I thought my head might burst, drums and horns and pipes and screams, but the saddest sound was the little bells. I dreamt of a maid at a feast with purple serpents in her hair, venom dripping from their fangs. And later I dreamt that maid again, slaying a savage giant in a castle built of snow.“ 

- Arya VIII, ASoS

That said, I don’t know what else it would foreshadow; I think that the interpretation of this vision as Sansa revealing what Littlefinger has done is by far the most convincing. I don’t think it foreshadows her spiking Sweetrobin’s doll, because that’s just so anticlimactic. Nor do I think it fits the pattern of the prophecy given above, which represents the Red Wedding through the metaphor of musical instruments and depicts Sansa’s poison hairnet as purple serpents worn in her hair. This is talking momentous events in more metaphorical terms. And as far as metaphorical representations go, in terms of influence on the plot, Petyr Baelish is most definitely a savage giant.

summary: I think the Daily Express is the same publication that wrote an article a while back about how there would be a showdown between...
question: I think the Daily Express is the same publication that wrote an article a while back about how there would be a showdown between Sansa and D*ny, and that Sansa would betray everyone out of anger that Jon is in love with D*ny and not her. So like, they were right that Sansa probably won't be fond of D*ny, and they seem to have picked up on Sansa's subconscious feelings for Jon, but geez louise they reached the most spectacularly wrong conclusion from it.
answer: Yeah, I mean I don’t really take anything the express says seriously, anon, because they seem to just hang out on reddit and turn really stupid theories into clickbait. At the same time, I don’t think it’s difficult for even the most casual viewer to understand D*ny and Sansa are going to clash, whether it’s over northern independence, resources, or jon. Could be one of or a mix of these things, and I am super excited to see it play out. Bring on the Winterfell scenes, it’s been 84 years.

reblog.comment: Yeah, I mean I don’t really take anything the express says seriously, anon, because they seem to just hang out on reddit and turn really stupid theories into clickbait. At the same time, I don’t think it’s difficult for even the most casual viewer to understand D*ny and Sansa are going to clash, whether it’s over northern independence, resources, or jon. Could be one of or a mix of these things, and I am super excited to see it play out. Bring on the Winterfell scenes, it’s been 84 years.

summary: ASOIAF top 5 game. Answer the following 5 questions, and then send this message anonymously to 5 people. (i) top 5 favorite...
question: ASOIAF top 5 game. Answer the following 5 questions, and then send this message anonymously to 5 people. (i) top 5 favorite characters (ii) top 5 most disliked characters (iii) top 5 favorite ships (iv) top 5 most disliked ships (v) top 5 favorite fanfiction
answer:
Top 5 favourite characters

1) Sansa Stark (10/10. Absolute best. Great chapters. Very interesting psychology. Will achieve greatness. A sweet child)

2) Theon Greyjoy (I love him. He deserved better. He won’t die after all that torture. The best Greyjoy. King of the Iron Islands)

3) Cersei Lannister (I loved her chapters the most despite some gross aspects. Great character. Let me tell you I was delighted by S6 and 7 show version)

4) Elia Martell (has a very interesting life. Can’t wait to learn more in WoW)

5) Catelyn Tully (best written character in the books)

Shout out to Stannis and Shireen

Top 5 most disliked characters

1) Jon Snow (he’s equally awful in the show and the books)

2) Daenerys Targaryen (the way GRRM writes her sucks. Her stans suck too)

3) Jaime Lannister (he’s interesting but otherwise has the most annoying stans)

4) Tyrion Lannister (serial rapists)

5) The Tyrells (all of them. I hope Young Griff fucks them up good)

Top 5 favourite ships

1) Cersei/Jaime (I only tolerate this because it’s very important to Cersei)

2) Theon/therapy

3) Stannis/the Iron Throne (and not burning his daughter)

4) Sansa/happiness

5) Elia/GRRM writing her in WoW

Top 5 most disliked ships

1) Jon/Dany

2) Jaime/Brienne

3) Sansa/Sandor and Sansa/Tyrion and Sansa/Petyr (and any older man and woman like Oberyn, Tywin, Stannis, Cersei etc)

4) Rhaegar/Lyanna

5) Theon/Ramsay

Top 5 favourite fanfiction (or at least recent ones I’ve read because I can’t remember the title)

1) Sun and Spear- I hate Elia raises Jon fics or Jon is raised in King’s Landing with no repercussions but this was sweet and well written as well as one of the few long Elia lives fics

2) the northern girl (winterfell’s daughter)- Sansa is a witch. Very gripping. Highly recommend

3) A Golden Heart (Untarnished)- Cersei married to different men and becoming happy. Plus the one time she made herself happy. 

4) The Kindness of Strangers- Same as the Cersei one. Five men Lysa Tully married who she could have been happy with and one time she didn’t marry and was happy anyway. 

5) the joinery- that famous Ned/Cersei fic. Before I became a Cersei stan the ending made me frustrated with her but now it gives me a warm fuzzy feeling.

6)  a tempest, a cyclone, a goddamned hurricane- Sansa can see the dead.

1) Sansa Stark (10/10. Absolute best. Great chapters. Very interesting psychology. Will achieve greatness. A sweet child)

2) Theon Greyjoy (I love him. He deserved better. He won’t die after all that torture. The best Greyjoy. King of the Iron Islands)

3) Cersei Lannister (I loved her chapters the most despite some gross aspects. Great character. Let me tell you I was delighted by S6 and 7 show version)

3) A Golden Heart (Untarnished)- Cersei married to different men and becoming happy. Plus the one time she made herself happy. 

4) The Kindness of Strangers- Same as the Cersei one. Five men Lysa Tully married who she could have been happy with and one time she didn’t marry and was happy anyway. 

5) the joinery- that famous Ned/Cersei fic. Before I became a Cersei stan the ending made me frustrated with her but now it gives me a warm fuzzy feeling.

6)  a tempest, a cyclone, a goddamned hurricane- Sansa can see the dead.

trail.content_raw:
Top 5 favourite characters

1) Sansa Stark (10/10. Absolute best. Great chapters. Very interesting psychology. Will achieve greatness. A sweet child)

2) Theon Greyjoy (I love him. He deserved better. He won’t die after all that torture. The best Greyjoy. King of the Iron Islands)

3) Cersei Lannister (I loved her chapters the most despite some gross aspects. Great character. Let me tell you I was delighted by S6 and 7 show version)

4) Elia Martell (has a very interesting life. Can’t wait to learn more in WoW)

5) Catelyn Tully (best written character in the books)

Shout out to Stannis and Shireen

Top 5 most disliked characters

1) Jon Snow (he’s equally awful in the show and the books)

2) Daenerys Targaryen (the way GRRM writes her sucks. Her stans suck too)

3) Jaime Lannister (he’s interesting but otherwise has the most annoying stans)

4) Tyrion Lannister (serial rapists)

5) The Tyrells (all of them. I hope Young Griff fucks them up good)

Top 5 favourite ships

1) Cersei/Jaime (I only tolerate this because it’s very important to Cersei)

2) Theon/therapy

3) Stannis/the Iron Throne (and not burning his daughter)

4) Sansa/happiness

5) Elia/GRRM writing her in WoW

Top 5 most disliked ships

1) Jon/Dany

2) Jaime/Brienne

3) Sansa/Sandor and Sansa/Tyrion and Sansa/Petyr (and any older man and woman like Oberyn, Tywin, Stannis, Cersei etc)

4) Rhaegar/Lyanna

5) Theon/Ramsay

Top 5 favourite fanfiction (or at least recent ones I’ve read because I can’t remember the title)

1) Sun and Spear- I hate Elia raises Jon fics or Jon is raised in King’s Landing with no repercussions but this was sweet and well written as well as one of the few long Elia lives fics

2) the northern girl (winterfell’s daughter)- Sansa is a witch. Very gripping. Highly recommend

3) A Golden Heart (Untarnished)- Cersei married to different men and becoming happy. Plus the one time she made herself happy. 

4) The Kindness of Strangers- Same as the Cersei one. Five men Lysa Tully married who she could have been happy with and one time she didn’t marry and was happy anyway. 

5) the joinery- that famous Ned/Cersei fic. Before I became a Cersei stan the ending made me frustrated with her but now it gives me a warm fuzzy feeling.

6)  a tempest, a cyclone, a goddamned hurricane- Sansa can see the dead.

Top 5 favourite characters

1) Sansa Stark (10/10. Absolute best. Great chapters. Very interesting psychology. Will achieve greatness. A sweet child)

2) Theon Greyjoy (I love him. He deserved better. He won’t die after all that torture. The best Greyjoy. King of the Iron Islands)

3) Cersei Lannister (I loved her chapters the most despite some gross aspects. Great character. Let me tell you I was delighted by S6 and 7 show version)

4) Elia Martell (has a very interesting life. Can’t wait to learn more in WoW)

5) Catelyn Tully (best written character in the books)

Shout out to Stannis and Shireen

Top 5 most disliked characters

1) Jon Snow (he’s equally awful in the show and the books)

2) Daenerys Targaryen (the way GRRM writes her sucks. Her stans suck too)

3) Jaime Lannister (he’s interesting but otherwise has the most annoying stans)

4) Tyrion Lannister (serial rapists)

5) The Tyrells (all of them. I hope Young Griff fucks them up good)

Top 5 favourite ships

1) Cersei/Jaime (I only tolerate this because it’s very important to Cersei)

2) Theon/therapy

3) Stannis/the Iron Throne (and not burning his daughter)

4) Sansa/happiness

5) Elia/GRRM writing her in WoW

2) Jaime/Brienne

3) Sansa/Sandor and Sansa/Tyrion and Sansa/Petyr (and any older man and woman like Oberyn, Tywin, Stannis, Cersei etc)

4) Rhaegar/Lyanna

5) Theon/Ramsay

1) Sun and Spear- I hate Elia raises Jon fics or Jon is raised in King’s Landing with no repercussions but this was sweet and well written as well as one of the few long Elia lives fics

blog.name: wolfqueen-is-here
blog.title: I'm not a Stark. | You are to me.
blog.description: Former: jonsacravings. She/her, bi. Posting: GoT, Jonsa, Sansa Stark, House Stark | Also loves: musical theatre, travelling, B99, Downton Abbey, Dragon Age II & more | Introverted but friendly.

title: Stark family feels
body:
Me: Ok, ok, I’m good, I’m over it. Next GOT-obsession planned for 2019.

*five minutes later*

Me: Ned would be so proud of his girls…

Me: *openly sobs in public*

reblog.comment:

blog.name: silkygoldmilkweed
blog.title: sansa stark & sandor clegane are soulmates

tags: a song of ice and fire
body:
Mycah

The reason book!Hound is so sensitive about the butcher’s boy is because the night he killed Mycah was the same night Lady was executed and shortly thereafter Sansa started skinchanging him and therefore fucking with his head.

The reason show!Hound hates gingers is because the night he killed ginger Mycah was the same night Lady was executed and shortly thereafter ginger Sansa started skinchanging him and therefore fucking with his head.


“Why don’t you just kill me like you did Mycah?” Arya had screamed at him. She was still defiant then, more angry than scared.

He answered by grabbing the front of her tunic and yanking her within an inch of his burned face. “The next time you say that name I’ll beat you so bad you’ll wish I killed you.”

blog.name: anarchyhelps
blog.title: wonderful life ;
blog.description:
kat here, just your friendly neighborhood procrastinator. occasionally helpful, but typically a disgruntled elderly person who doesn't understand what the fuck anyone is talking about until it's already over. please check out my what i do and remember that i'm pretty flexible about things that aren't on there, that being said, i can't deliver your baby or kill a wasp. if you're in need of those services, i'm not ya guy.

she's no shrek, but still pretty good. - ★★★☆☆

summary: so like i was outside brushing my dog, who for reference is that big dire wolf looking son of a b down below. it was lightly...
body: so like i was outside brushing my dog, who for reference is that big dire wolf looking son of a b down below. it was lightly raining as it’s currently winter. i was singing never enough (greatest showman was whatever but that song? dig it) to him as i brushed out his coat. i have auburn hair and blue eyes. what i’m tryna get at is if i’m living my best sansa stark life where the fuck is @jonsnow to come at take notice. i want a boy with dark hair and nice eyes to come keep me company, goddamn. is it too much to ask????

blog.name: 0pheliaraine
blog.title: Ophelia Raine
blog.description: I write (primarily) Game of Thrones fan fiction including Petyr x Sansa, Tywin x Marge, Stannis x Sansa, Tywin x Sansa, among others.

summary: And finally on Sabbatical... Tywin stared at his phone in his hand as a scowl started to form across his old handsome face....
caption:
And finally on Sabbatical…

Tywin stared at his phone in his hand as a scowl started to form across his old handsome face.

“Careful,” Margaery teased, craning her neck up to kiss the corner of his mouth. “Window’s open. Afternoon breeze might freeze that look on your face." She yawned prettily. "Who was that anyway?”

“That,” clipped Tywin testily, “was the Yacht Club. Seems that The Stamford is most apologetic, but they have had to revoke my family’s membership. Apparently, my daughter had caused quite a stir late last night.”

  • Read the final chapter.
  • Let’s start at the very beginning.

blog.name: madamebaggio

blog.description: All my thoughts... They just keep spinning out of control.

tags: king arthur legend of the sword
my dream ship that will never sail
summary: “You lived with him all this time...”  “Are we together in this or not?”  “I don’t even know if I can trust you most of the...
caption:
“You lived with him all this time…”

“Are we together in this or not?”

“I don’t even know if I can trust you most of the time.”

“Then why am I here?”

Not everything is roses between those two.

reblog.comment:

“Then why am I here?”

Not everything is roses between those two.
